definition: (name of states and dynasties at several different periods)/surname Qi
neat/even/level with/identical/simultaneous/all together/to even sth out
king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great

sentences.english: During the Warring States Period (475-221BC), the King of the State of Qi was very fond of listening to yu ensembles.
sentences.chinese: 戰國時，齊宣王喜歡聽竽，通常是三百人的大合奏。

sentences.english: King Xuan of Qi often ordered this band to play for him.
sentences.chinese: 齊宣王常常叫這個三百人的樂隊爲他演奏。

sentences.english: King Xuanwang of Qi asked Mencius to describe what a fine government was like.
sentences.chinese: 齊宣王讓孟子給他講一講善政是什麼樣子的。
